room_title: Escape room "The Ringmaster's Den" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Had a blast completed Ringmaster just in time, will be back again for other ones soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Ringmaster's Den" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: I went with 2 other people, we were partnered up with a group of 8. It was so much fun! We did The Ringmaster's Den and were able to break out. I would recommend this place and would definitely go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Ringmaster's Den" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: We had so much fun playing for the first time tonight! I am proud to say our small group of 6 were successful at escaping the Ringmasters room. It was the first attempt for all 6 of us and we made it out with more than 6 minutes to spare. It is a very fun adventure, even for old folks like us!

room_title: Escape room "The Ringmaster's Den" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: It was like a fun,exciting quest. There were so many illusion mind tricks and it definitely helps on communication skills and coming together. I really recommend people to come and check this place out
